SqlList.SearchSql:
select a.ArchiveID, a.xh,
a.xh as engArchNo, b.gcmc as singleProjName, a.ajtm as archTitle, a.tzCount as drawPages, a.wzCount as filePages, a.zpCount as photoPages, '' as efilePages, a.bzdw as makeOrgName, (CASE WHEN a.lrsj='' THEN '' ELSE convert(varchar(10),a.lrsj,23) end) as archivingDate, a.dh as oldArchId, '单卷' as shelvingTypeCode, '3' as archWidth, '永久' as storageTypeCode, '秘密' as securityLevelCode, (CASE WHEN a.lrsj='' THEN '' ELSE convert(varchar(10),a.lrsj,23) end) as makeDate, a.wzCount as textNums, a.tzCount as drawNums, a.zpCount as photoNums, '' as efileNums, a.ShortDH as regNo, a.note as archNote, a.lrr as arrangedBy, (SELECT c.SystemInfoName FROM T_SystemInfo c WHERE c.SystemInfoID=a.ajlx)as archTypeCode from T_Archive a inner join T_SingleProject b on a.SingleProjectID=b.SingleProjectID where 1=1 {0} order by a.xh asc
